head.title: Congress Appears Set To Act on Rollovers

hedline.hl1: Congress Appears Set To Act on Rollovers

block.p: The 103 deaths attributed to defective Firestone tires have galvanized Congress to tackle the larger problem of vehicle rollovers.

Automakers have blocked federal action, but the last obstacle appeared to fall when Senator Richard Shelby of Alabama dropped his objections to a plan to begin providing consumers with information on the stability of many 2001 models.
